problem.p: Here's an example of a "Drag and Drop" question with draggable images (some labeled and some not) that can be placed over the main image.

text.p: Please place the hydrogen atoms and / or oxygen atoms connected with the left carbon atom into their appropriate locations for the ethyl glycol compound, which has the formula C2H6O2. (Hint: place the first hydrogen atom into the lowest left empty space. Place the second hydrogen atom into the topmost left empty space.)
